quote: It was a good experience managing the project with him as a developer. He has a strong foundation and is always ahead of his project timelines. Intuitive, understands the tasks quickly, and has a nice approach to gathering client requirements. He is a Quick learner and diligent at work.
name: Nihanth Manyam
title: Manager at GUSS

quote: Turki is a highly dedicated team coach and software engineer. I would strongly recommend him as a technology professional. I've taught Turki in the University of Glasgow's software engineering courses and employed him in our Glasgow University Software Service. Turki is highly professional and he always puts the extra miles in, taking his responsibilities extremely seriously even when they were part of a University course.
name: Tim Storer
title: Senior Lecturer in Software Engineering at University of Glasgow

quote: On joining GUSS, Turki quickly proved himself as a motivated and enthusiastic team member. He demonstrated strong analytical thinking and problem solving skills and contributed many ideas to client projects. As an excellent communicator with a positive attitude, he consistently supported his team in meeting their targets. On more than one occasion, he stepped in to support projects that needed urgent attention. I recommend Turki as a reliable, hard-working and trustworthy employee.
name: Tess Vaughan
title: Software Engineer & Manager at GUSS

quote: I was lucky enough to work with Turki for the 3rd year team project last year, where we made a social-media style webapp.  Turki was engaged and proactive from day one, being a strong voice in the team, but also making sure to take input from everyone else such that we all delivered our best work. In a nutshell, Turki is a clever, hard-working and well-rounded software engineer. I hope you enjoy working with him as much as I did!
name: George Yarr
title: Team member at Glasgow University 3rd Year Project

quote: I’ve had the pleasure of working with Turki on various projects, and he has been vital to our success throughout. He has a talent for explaining his intricate and detailed ideas in a simple and understandable manner. Turki has a great team spirit and work ethic, whether working independently on a component of a bigger system or directly collaborating with team members, he always takes great pride in his work. I wholeheartedly endorse Turki for any position looking for a driven, talented and dependable individual.
name: Nathan Hutchison
title: Student at University of Glasgow
